price: 63. Alobi: Oyo asali boye nde mokolo wa bango oyo, botuna bango soki bakoki koloba.
arabic: قَالَ بَلۡ فَعَلَهُۥ كَبِيرُهُمۡ هَٰذَا فَسۡـَٔلُوهُمۡ إِن كَانُواْ يَنطِقُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: qāla bal faʿalahu kabīruhum hādhā fasalūhum in kānū yanṭiqūna
